controllers.tui

Class TUIMenuController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.tui.TUIMenuController

  • public class TUIMenuController
extends java.lang.Object
    TUI (Textual User Interface) view menu. Allow user to setup the Game options such as distance goal, players number, etc.
    Version:
    1.0.3
    Author:
    Simon RENOULT
